scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && rm -rf build/temp
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master; npm run build && npm version patch && npm run build; git commit -a -m 'chore(release): created patch release/'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master; npm run build && npm version minor && npm run build; git commit -a -m 'chore(release): created minor release/'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master; npm run build && npm version major && npm run build; git commit -a -m 'chore(release): created major release/'; git push origin master --tags
